The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit

The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs
#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit

The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government. 

#WorldGovSummit

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit

The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government.

Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days
Today I chaired a post-reform cabinet meeting. A govt. seeing the future with positive energy and youth's optimism https://t.co/i2sVRcylc6

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit

The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs
#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit

The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government. 

#WorldGovSummit

Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit

The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs
#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit

The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government. 

#WorldGovSummit

Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future

#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government.

Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future

#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

#WorldGovSummit

to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources

#WorldGovSummit

 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

 of our federal government.

Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days
Today I chaired a post-reform cabinet meeting. A govt. seeing the future with positive energy and youth's optimism https://t.co/i2sVRcylc6

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit

The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs
#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit

The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government.

Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit

The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs
#WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit

The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit

The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit

The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit

A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit

Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit

The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit

We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit

An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit

We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit

We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit

The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit

The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit

The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government. 

#WorldGovSummit

The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth’s aspirations, ideas and solutions
We approved forming the Education and HR Council headed by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president’s directives and our people’s aspirations.
We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
I asked the ministers, especially the new ones, to start developing and submitting their programs and action plans for the first 100 days

Our young country was built by the hands and achievements of youth. Youth is our strength and speed and is our treasure for the future
Youth have hopes and dreams, issues and challenges; they are the reason why societies prosper or fail. They are our hope for the future.
I ask every UAE university to nominate 3 young men and 3 young women who graduated in the last two years or who are in their final years
Youth represents some half of our Arab societies, so it is only logical to give them a voice and role in governing the nation
I would like to choose a young person under the age of 25 to represent our youth, their issues and ambitions as a UAE government Minister.
